system/commander.html.title: commander
system/commander.html.body:
commander
Introduction
The complete solution for node.js command-line interfaces, inspired by Ruby's commander.document
Usage
program
  .option('--type [typeName]', 'Build type, weapp/rn/h5')
  .option('--watch', 'Build type, weapp/rn/h5')
  .parse(process.argv)

rimraf
Introduction
The UNIX command rm -rf for node.document
Usage
